attributes.title: Bad juju
attributes.review: this app is cursed with all type of bad juju. As soon as I downloaded the app...a bolt of lightning almost struck me down. Not to mention my phone froze as soon as it seen a orange with a toupee glued on backwards and my phone has never been the same since.

attributes.title: I hate this app
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw trumps nudes and that scard my children’s. And me I all and all hate this app so much it said I was black and said if I didn’t delete the app immediately it would send a nuke to my house I texted trump and said that his nudes leaked then he sent me some more nudes . I HATE THIS APP SOOOO MUCH 🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮.

attributes.title: no thank you disgusting next please
attributes.review: i opened this app and the first thing i saw was the racist man that looks so bronzed he doesn’t look white he actually invented his own race... my eyes were shriveled from the sight so i put bleach and other chemicals in them like cheeto instructed to put in our bodies to fight the corona virus so i thought maybe it would help with my shriveled eyes too... please don’t download this app it will deteriorate your body as you know it... we don’t want to support a man like this...

attributes.title: Worst decision of my life
attributes.review:
As soon as i opened the app on my phone  I was greeted with the SOGGY CHEETO 💦💦screaming 🤢🤢🤢 I have never been so DISGUSTED in my life. I wish there was a way to erase any memory of this app from my brain because it was really that bad. I hate Donald Trump 🤡and even more so for making this STUPUD APP🤢😡😡

#blacklivesmatter

attributes.title: This gave my coronavirus
attributes.review: I actually downloaded this app and as soon as I opened it I was verbally harassed by an old white incel and called multiple racial slurs. The app who this is in support of has tried to take away my constitutional rights which is pretty ironic because of who it is. This old grimy p*dophile Cheeto is toxic. Dump tr*mp

attributes.title: If I could give it zero stars I would
attributes.review: First off I was very offended even downloading this app. I feel disrespected even looking at the app. It’s very very glitchy and it is constantly crazy. I wouldn't recommend downloading it. I give it a -100 stars.

attributes.title: Just not it❤️
attributes.review: I opened the app to see and orange stale must lookin cheeto not what I expected. Secondly when I started interacting with the app me pet unicorn started to fart uncontrollably and my stove caught on fire! thirdly my dad never came home with milk I BLAME THIS HORRIBLE APP! Lastly when I went to take a number 2 my poo came out PURPLE! HORRIBLE APP DO NOT DOWNLOAD🐀🤡😌

First I want to start off by saying that this app is horrible. I didn’t want to open the app and see such a horrible image. Absolutely disappointed. That man is absolutely horrible. The app is such bad quality and does NOT deserve to be on the App Store.

attributes.title: NO THANKS
attributes.review: I downloaded this because I heard good things but as soon as it was installed I opened the app to an terrifying Cheeto rat.  I closed my eyes in time but my sisters were next to me and now they have no eyes or teeth. I would not recommend downloading this app. Thanks for everything Cheeto boy 😐 😐 😐 😠

attributes.title: This is the worst app ever
attributes.review: This app should be in a horror movie. I’ve never felt so scared in my entire life until I saw a wrinkly talking orange being a racist misogynistic piece of garbage🤮 definitely do not recommend this app unless you want to have nightmares for the rest of your life
